answers.answer: Big congrats to you.  I am so happy for you!  I took the dollar tree test this past Friday and Saturday. Both came out positive.  You don't have to spend a lot of money to find out.Blessings!
I know I read your story. Congrats to you too and I pray that ALL goes well! So, you're due in Aug too?
CONGRATULATIONS to both of you...I am so happy for you. I wish you all the best in these upcoming months.Stick baby dust to you!!!!

Yes, I am due Aug. 24 from the birth calendars I have checked out online.  I am a little nervous since I m/c in Sept. but am praying that all is well.  I am trying to get a hold of my doc today to see if she will send in a order to take blood and have my progesterone checked and my HCG levels.  I pray we both have a good pregnancy and healthy babies.  Blessings!

I usually deliver early too and have 8 almost 9 pounders would be larger if they didn't come before the due date. I do alot of cardio, but lift weights ALOT(I like the look). Anywho, I plan to stay off the weights and increase the cardio for myself(I'm older now and need to put effort into bouncing back lol!. I had gestational diabetes and had to shoot insulin the last go round and I don't want a repeat.
Thank so much for the congrats!

Wow, we are due very close together.  I usually deliver 2 to 3 weeks early.  3 weeks early the first time and 2 weeks early the 2nd time.  Still good birth weights though.  7 to 8 1/2 lb. babies.  With my age and such I am definitley thinking epidural this time.  I'm real healthy and have always been a little bit of a health nut.  My doc told me that I am healthier than most 20 year olds she has.  So lets hope so.  In fact when I wanted to start conceiving again she told me I had to stop being so athletic and gain some weight.  I would run 4 - 10 miles a day several days per week and did a lot of outside work. Now I am being good and have slowed down.
How old are you now??  I turned 41 this fall.

question: I haven't posted in about three weeks because I had finals to concentrate on, but I just thought I post today to share my news......I got 2 lines!!!!!!!!!Totally unexpected and I found out on accident, I had taken a test on Sat morning and it was neg so, I wrapped it up and was going to throw it away,but forgot. Yesterday while I was doing laundry i went to throw it out and it feel out of the bag and there was a faint line in the test area($tree brand). I was floored and I had to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks. Oh when I took the test I didn't wait the 4-10mins. I threw it away as soon as the control line showed up. Anywho took another yesterday and another this morning and they were both positive!
title: YEAH!!!
